title: Oh Allah, you love the Prophet ﷺ so grant me this for his ‎ﷺ sake, permissible?
transcript: Aisha from Saudi Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam wa Rahmatullah Alright I wanted to ask is it okay to make supplications and say Oh Allah you love Prophet Muhammad peace be upon him so much and for his sake grant me this and any supplication and okay this is this is this is not permissible to ask Allah Azza Wa Jal to grant you what you want for the sake of whether it's Prophet Muhammad Alayhi Salatu Wassalam whether it's Archangel Jibreel whether it's this or that this is not permissible and it's an innovation however you may ask Allah Azza Wa Jal with your own deeds by saying Oh Allah with my love to the Prophet Alayhi Salatu Wassalam and with my following his sunnah I ask you to do so and so that is permissible and Allah knows best
